<<<<<<< HEAD
A Cabinet of choice jewels, or, The Christians joy and gladness set forth in sundry pleasant new Christmas-cards.
[4], 20 p.
Printed by J.M. for J. Deacon ..., London : 1688.
"This may be printed. R.P." Contains additional illustrated t.p., with woodcut showing the Nativity of Jesus. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
